resources.string: Permission to use Shizuku is required to access the Android Virtualization Framework
Allow access to Shizuku to continue…
Oops! Permission was denied. Please allow access to continue
Yikes, something went wrong. Make sure Shizuku is installed and up to date
To access the system virtualization service, the "MANAGE_VIRTUAL_MACHINE" permission is required. Shizuku is used to grant this, so you won\'t see a pop up.
To make a virtual machine, the "USE_CUSTOM_VIRTUAL_MACHINE" permission is required. Shizuku is used to grant this, so you won\'t see a pop up.
